**Edited <time datetime="2017-11-19T14:51:16Z" title="11/19/2017 02:51  PM" data-short="6 yr">November 19, 2017</time> by StarCrusher96**

> 5 minutes ago, StarCrusher96 said:
>

> Hi I'd like to know how to make ternary systems.
> 

assuming you have 3 bodies where C orbits B and B orbits A

and assuming you want AB to be binary and BC to be binary

inside the Body node of C you can just add:

    SigmaBinary {}

inside the Body node of B you need to add this:

    SigmaBinary
    {
        after = C
    }

[@Sigma88](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/113260-sigma88/)
